ObjectClass.Name: Macrofab
ObjectClass.Description:
MACROFAB:
Advanced vehicle production building
Regenerates HP and LC

Objective.Name: Equip Nuke
Objective.Details: \Automatically equip closest\HEAVY CRUISER with a Mini Nuke

Objective.Name: Build Valkyrie M.R.B.
Objective.Details: Advanced field-support combat vehicle \Repairs itself and allies at long range \Gives long-range AG fire support \Vulnerable to airborne attackers

Objective.Name: Build Valkyrie M.R.B.
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires Machinery-Tech upgrade\ at the FACTORY

Objective.Name: Build Javalin M.A.R.
Objective.Details: Long range anti-tank mobile artillery \Slow firing and lightly armored \Extremely high single target damage \Cannot attack air targets

Objective.Name: Build Sabre Interceptor
Objective.Details: Air supremacy light strike-fighter \Specialized for evasive AA engagements \Weak vs ground based AA \Specials-Tech improves AA attack

Objective.Name: Build Longbow Heavy Cruiser
Objective.Details: Nuclear armed multi-role standoff gunship \Strong splash damage vs gnd and air \Devastating vs far off, dense targets \Launches re-loadable Micro-Nuke

Objective.Name: Build Longbow Heavy Cruiser
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires Machinery and Aerospace\ Tech upgrades at the FACTORY \ and MACROFAB

Objective.Name: Upgrade Aerospace-Tech
Objective.Details: \Upgrade Tornade E regen rate \Enable constructing Heavy Cruisers

Objective.Name: Upgrade Aerospace-Tech
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires Machinery-Tech upgrade\ at the FACTORY

ObjectClass.Name: Aerospace-Tech Center
ObjectClass.Description:
Aerospace-Tech:
This Macrofab is now a dedicated Tech support building
Visible to all factions through Fog of War

ObjectClass.Name: Macrofab (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Macrofab is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
